name: Destroy All Aliens!
description:
You're Larry (last-minute name) and you work in the fbi office quarters. You are having a nice day until... BOOM! Aliens start invading earth and turning your co-workers into zombies (never visualised because budget).

The game is actually a 2D-3D shooter with a pixel art visual style. It also has a shitty rewind mechanic that serves almost no purpouse.

This game was made with a friend of mine who helped code the game.

Assets:

   Sprites and 3D assets: Made by me during this week.

   Code: Made between my friend and I.

   Music: The song used is mine, is called "Thorns". I have actually released it as Songaku on Youtube, Spotify, ...
